titleStmt.title: At Edinburgh the first day of February, 1642. Forsamekle [sic] as by the crueltie of the rebels in Ireland, great numbers of His Majesties good subjects, and our own countreymen there, are daily forced to flee out of Ireland to those parts in the west countrey, ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Primrose, Archibald, Sir, 1616-1679.
Scotland. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Arch Primerose, Cler., S.Cons.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
